type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.result.ComponentSelectionReason
type.description:
Answers the question why a component was selected during the dependency resolution.
@since 1.3

method.name: getDescription
method.description: Returns a human-consumable description of this selection reason.

method.name: isConflictResolution
method.description: Informs whether the component was selected by conflict resolution. For more information about Gradle's conflict resolution please refer to the user guide. org.gradle.api.artifacts.ResolutionStrategy contains information about conflict resolution and includes means to configure it.

method.name: isExpected
method.description:
Informs whether the component is the requested selection of all dependency declarations, and was not replaced for some reason, such as conflict resolution.
@since 1.11

method.name: isForced
method.description: Informs whether the component was forced. Users can force components via org.gradle.api.artifacts.ResolutionStrategy or when declaring dependencies (see org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl.DependencyHandler).

method.name: isSelectedByRule

property.name: conflictResolution
property.description: Informs whether the component was selected by conflict resolution. For more information about Gradle's conflict resolution please refer to the user guide. org.gradle.api.artifacts.ResolutionStrategy contains information about conflict resolution and includes means to configure it.

property.name: description
property.description: Returns a human-consumable description of this selection reason.

property.name: expected
property.description:
Informs whether the component is the requested selection of all dependency declarations, and was not replaced for some reason, such as conflict resolution.
@since 1.11

property.name: forced
property.description: Informs whether the component was forced. Users can force components via org.gradle.api.artifacts.ResolutionStrategy or when declaring dependencies (see org.gradle.api.artifacts.dsl.DependencyHandler).

property.name: selectedByRule
